avalancheActivity.highlights: Windslabs have formed in gullies and slopes facing N, NE and E.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Some snow has accumulated during SW-snowshowers since the 14th. Little snow in general and mostly some  windslabs in gullies and slopes facing N, NE and E. No snowpits have been done.

travelAdvisory.comment: Snow is present in all mountainous areas in Iceland. Wind slabs are likely to be found in most parts and will continue to form in W- snow showers on Tuesday and SE- snowfall on Wednesday. Weak layers can still be found in North Iceland but thaw last week has strengthened the snow pack in East Iceland.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Snow can be found in all parts and wind slabs are present in the mountains. They will continue forming in W winds on Tuesday and Wednesday. Persistent weakness in snowpits in N-Iceland.

weatherForecast.highlights: V-NV 10-15 m/s og éljagangur á þriðjudag. Skammvinn SA átt á miðvikudag og hlýnar en snýst svo aftur í vestan átt með snjókomu eða éljum.

avalancheActivity.highlights: New snow has been added in westerly winds. Unstable windslabs could be ontop of older firn. No reports of recent avalanches and no snowpits have been done lately.

snowpackStructure.highlights: New snow has accumulated in lowlands where winds have been calm. Higher in mountains, strong westerly winds have transported the snow and there could be isolated windslabs in lee side of mountains and gullies. No recent snowpits have benn done.

travelAdvisory.comment: Snow is present in all mountainous areas in Iceland. Wind slabs are likely to be found in most parts and will continue to form in W- snow showers on Tuesday and SE- snowfall on Wednesday. Weak layers can still be found in North Iceland but thaw last week has strengthened the snow pack in East Iceland.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Snow can be found in all parts and wind slabs are present in the mountains. They will continue forming in W winds on Tuesday and Wednesday. Persistent weakness in snowpits in N-Iceland.

weatherForecast.highlights: Spáð er V-NV átt með einhverri snjókomu eða éljum um tíma, þó ekki mikið uppsafnað. Skil ganga yfir Vestfirði á miðvikudag og gæti snjóað nokkuð ef spár ganga eftir en óvissa er með vindstefnu. Gengur svo í norðlæga átt á fimmtudag með snjókomu.

avalancheActivity.comment: No recent avalanches have been reported.
avalancheActivity.highlights: A persistent weakness may still be present in upper elevations but little snow is in lower part of mountains in the region in general.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Wind slabs may have formed in NE-aspects after SW winds and snow showers over the weekend. A weakness may still be present high up in the mountains.

travelAdvisory.comment: Snow is present in all mountainous areas in Iceland. Wind slabs are likely to be found in most parts and will continue to form in W- snow showers on Tuesday and SE- snowfall on Wednesday. Weak layers can still be found in North Iceland but thaw last week has strengthened the snow pack in East Iceland.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Snow can be found in all parts and wind slabs are present in the mountains. They will continue forming in W winds on Tuesday and Wednesday. Persistent weakness in snowpits in N-Iceland.

weatherForecast.highlights: Stíf vestanátt til fjalla á þriðjudag og éljagangur. Á miðvikudag hægir á vindi en snýst í suðvestanátt með snjókomu um allt land.

avalancheActivity.highlights: The snowpack has strengthened after rain and thaw throughout all elevations and subsequent freezing last weekend. Possibly some small windslabs high in the mountains after strong SW winds.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Warming and rain last week with rain in the mountains. Thawing likeleyin all elevations and subsequent freezing has caused the snow pack to stabilize further. The snow line is at around 400 m a.s.l. and some dry windslabs could be found in highest elevations.

travelAdvisory.comment: Snow is present in all mountainous areas in Iceland. Wind slabs are likely to be found in most parts and will continue to form in W- snow showers on Tuesday and SE- snowfall on Wednesday. Weak layers can still be found in North Iceland but thaw last week has strengthened the snow pack in East Iceland.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Snow can be found in all parts and wind slabs are present in the mountains. They will continue forming in W winds on Tuesday and Wednesday. Persistent weakness in snowpits in N-Iceland.

weatherForecast.highlights: Stíf vestanátt og úrkomulaust á þriðjudag. Snýst í suðaustanátt með snjókomu seinnipart miðvikudags en svo gengur í norðanátt og kólnandi
